mapper.select: SELECT BID, BTITLE, BDATE, BHIT, BOARD.USERID, BCONTENT,BINDENT, BSTEP, BGROUP,BOARDTYPE from BOARD INNER JOIN MEMBER ON BOARD.USERID = MEMBER.USERID AND BOARDTYPE = #{boardtype} ORDER BY BGROUP, BSTEP ASC
SELECT BID, BTITLE, BDATE, BHIT, MEMBER.USERID, BCONTENT, BINDENT, BSTEP, BGROUP FROM BOARD,MEMBER WHERE BOARD.USERID = MEMBER.USERID and bid = #{bid} ORDER BY BGROUP, BSTEP ASC
insert into board (bid, btitle, userid, bcontent, bgroup, bindent, bstep) values(board_seq.nextval, #{btitle}, 'admin', #{bcontent}, board_seq.currval, 0, 0)
UPDATE BOARD SET BTITLE=#{btitle}, BCONTENT=#{bcontent} WHERE BID = #{bid}
